maiet.SCRIPT:
function NPC_101012:Init( NPCID ) NPC_101012.BufIdIcyRegen = 41304 NPC_101012.BufIdIceCageDeco = 41300 end
function NPC_101012:OnSwallowBegin( Enemy ) -- GLog("NPC_101012:OnSwallowBegin()\n") local Summoner = this:GetSummoner() Summoner:GainBuff( NPC_101012.BufIdIcyRegen ) end
function NPC_101012:OnSwallowFinish( Enemy ) this:ClearJob() this:Die( this ) end
function NPC_101012:OnFinishIceCage( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor ) ThisNPC:Die( ThisNPC ) end
function NPC_101012:OnDie( Despawn ) local Summoner = this:GetSummoner() Summoner:RemoveBuff( NPC_101012.BufIdIcyRegen )
this:RemoveBuff( NPC_101012.BufIdIceCageDeco ) end
